item.description:
DivorceCare is both a weekly support group/seminar for people who are divorced or separated. Talk with people who understand and find a way to heal from the hurt of divorce.

Around 8-12 of us meet on Thursdays from 6:30- 8:30 pm at Crossroads Childcare Center located at 1301 Edgell Road in Framingham.

13 consecutive Thursday evenings completes one cycle of the curriculum. You can jump in at any point; each discussion stands on its own.

The DivorceCare material is based on a Christian perspective, though people of all faiths and no faith participate in this program.

DivorceCare is not a dating environment.

Call or e-mail this week to reserve your spot: David Hartman: (508)-881-8171 // Email David or Debbie at divorcecare@crosscommchurch.org

See our church's website http://CrossCommChurch.org

Sponsored by Crossroads Community Church
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back; look 4 DivorceCare sign, enter through rear door, walk up stairs, look for the signs.
item.name: DivorceCare Meetup: Topic is "What's Happening to Me"
